mapper.insert: insert into app_area (v_code, v_pareacode, v_name, n_level, v_upcode, v_status, name_initials, isHot, gmt_modified, gmt_create) values (#{vCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vPareacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vUpcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameInitials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ishot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update app_area set v_pareacode = #{vPareacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_name = #{vName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_level = #{nLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_upcode = #{vUpcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_status = #{vStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_initials = #{nameInitials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isHot = #{ishot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where v_code = #{vCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select v_code, v_pareacode, v_name, n_level, v_upcode, v_status, name_initials, isHot, gmt_modified, gmt_create from app_area where v_code = #{vCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select v_code, v_pareacode, v_name, n_level, v_upcode, v_status, name_initials, isHot, gmt_modified, gmt_create from app_area
